Dataset

class utils.dataset.BaseDataset(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)

Base class for all datasets.

__init__(config: Config, load_text: bool = False, load_query: bool = False)
Parameters:

  • config – the config object

  • load_text – if True, load text related data

  • load_query – if True, load query related data

config
cache_dir

the cache folder for the dataset related data

Type:

str

_rank

the current process ID

Type:

int

logger
Type:

MasterLogger

init_training(qrel_path, negative_path)

Initialize qrels and negatives.

class utils.dataset.TrainDataset(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)

the list of (query_idx, pos_seq_idx) pairs

list[tuple]

class utils.dataset.RawTripleTrainDataset(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)

Training dataset for config.loader_train=='triple-raw'. Use utils.util.IterableDataloader to load.

triple_path
